resumeText:
SOFIA RAMIREZ
San Francisco, CA • sofia@example.com • github.com/sofiaramirez

SUMMARY
Product-focused software engineer delivering reliable, accessible web experiences for 15M monthly users. Led experimentation and mentoring initiatives that lifted growth KPIs.

EXPERIENCE
Senior Product Engineer — Loop Labs (2021–Present)
- Directed React and Node.js modernization of experimentation platform, cutting test launch time 40% while raising velocity by 18%.
- Designed resilient APIs with TypeScript and GraphQL, processing 65M events/day with <0.2% error rate.
- Partnered with design to ship WCAG AA accessible UI kits across 12 surfaces.
- Mentored 6 engineers, establishing instrumentation guardrails adopted org-wide.

Product Engineer — Brightline (2018–2021)
- Built experimentation dashboards that improved activation by 9%.
- Introduced growth mindset workshops for engineers and PMs.

PROJECTS
Impact Review Automation — Automated insight pack generation for experiment reviews using GPT APIs, saving 30 hours/quarter.

EDUCATION
B.S. Computer Science, University of Texas at Austin

SKILLS
React, Node.js, GraphQL, Accessibility, Experimentation, Mentoring, Data instrumentation, TypeScript
jobDescription: We need a senior product engineer to lead end-to-end delivery of web experiences. Key focuses: React, Node.js, experimentation, API design, accessibility, data instrumentation, mentoring, growth mindset.
